EmailTemplate.subject: GA11-025 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin – November 2011
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're receiving this newsletter because of your relationship with TriTech Software Systems.
POSTED 11.18.11
GA11-025 Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin – November 2011
Dear Clients,
The Technical Advisory - GA11-025 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin - November 2011 has been posted to the MyVisiNet support site. Microsoft has released one (1) Critical Security Update and one (1) Critical Security Advisory workaround for the month of November, 2011. The vulnerabilities discussed in this bulletin involve Microsoft Windows and other Microsoft products.
You may access this advisory via the Myvisinet Support site under Documentation | Tech Advisories | Microsoft Advisories | 2011 or by clicking on the link included on this email.
Sincerely,
Tony Vardiman Technical Services Frontline Supervisor | VisiNet Solutions TriTech Software Systems | tritech.com Direct: 858.799.7441 | Mobile: 619.816.7100 Fax: 858.799.7010 | Support: 800.847.4223 Support Website: myvisinet.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego | CA | 92121
